Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Goblet
Description: Black and red goblet with a flat base, slightly restricted mouth and simple lip. The surface has been burnished, though the gloss has quite faded. The red-slipped exterior still bears traces of an oblique burnishing, whereas the black interior surface bears horizontal traces.
